CHAPTER 18 On [their]592-their morning jog , [Sam]32-sam told [Chewy]79-chewy about [Maddie]31-maddie . Being in love with [Maddie]31-maddie was not real .

Usually [Sam]32-sam was [a pretty optimistic kind of guy]598-a pretty optimistic kind of guy . The glass was never half empty and there was always something better around the corner . That afternoon , [Annie]70-annie sat at an outdoor table at [La Merlina café]16-la merlina café , sipping iced tea and picking at a plate of fruit shaped into flowers . [She]70-annie 'd been amazed that [Bob]97-bob had set the meeting up with [Zack DiMarco]107-zack so quickly . [They]845-they must be very good friends if [the wealthy playboy]846-the wealthy playboy could drop everything on such short notice .

[La Merlina]16-la merlina café was the flavor of the month in [LA]12-la . [The décor]847-the décor was so minimalist it was barren . The only decoration was on the walls , signed by [the celebrity diners]848-the celebrity diners . It was so chic , [the staff]849-the staff kept [Annie]70-annie waiting fifteen minutes before [she]70-annie was shown to [her]70-annie table . It was the sort of place [she]70-annie should take [clients]850-clients and be seen . [She]70-annie 'd never been [there]672-there before .

[Anyone who was [anyone]221-anyone]852-anyone who was anyone sat inside where the air conditioning kept temperatures and tempers down . [Only Annie]70-annie and [a few wannabe starlets]854-a few wannabe starlets sat outside under the umbrellas , trying to appear cool despite the trickle of sweat down [their]845-they backs .

[She]70-annie regretted not getting [Zack]107-zack to make the reservation . [He]107-zack was [one of [the hottest properties in [town]275-town]856-the hottest properties in town]855-one of the hottest properties in town . [He]107-zack may not be [an actor or agent]858-an actor or agent or connected to the movie business in any way , but [he]107-zack was known around [town]275-town . For all the wrong reasons as far as [Annie]70-annie was concerned . [The self - made billionaire]860-the self - made billionaire with a penchant for [fast cars]861-fast cars and [fast women]862-fast women had a reputation [most men]863-most men envied .

It was almost impossible for [him]107-zack to evade the limelight , even if [he]107-zack 'd wanted to . Which [he]107-zack did n't seem to . Not if the gossip columns were anything to go by .
